analysis.key_quote: The idea of replacing civil servants who are in many cases nationally or internationally recognized experts in their fields with political appointees who may have no qualifications beyond fealty to whomever is the current president is completely unacceptable.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of a merit-based civil service and expressing concerns about politicization and the potential loss of accountability and expertise in policy-making.
